title: CURRENT_ACCOUNT | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns the account locator used by the user’s current session.

If you want to find the account name rather than the account locator, use
CURRENT_ACCOUNT_NAME instead. The preferred account identifier (orgname-account_name) uses
the account name, not the account locator.
The data type of the returned value is VARCHAR.
This shows how to call the CURRENT_ACCOUNT function:
